nodes.text: Che Amanwe Papanoida was a female Pantoran and a daughter of Baron Notluwiski Papanoida who served as Supreme Chairman of Pantora.

During the Clone Wars, Che Amanwe and her sister Chi Eekway were kidnapped by Rodian bounty hunter Greedo at their Coruscant home. He was aided by a Gotal assistant, who grabbed an unsuspecting Papanoida, followed by her sister. The two were separated, and with the help of Pantoran Senator Riyo Chuchi and Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, Chi Eekway was rescued from Separatist clutches.
Che Amanwe Papanoida is based on George Lucas' daughter, Amanda Lucas and voiced by Meredith Salenger.
